content.text:
# Karnataka State Film Award for Best Cinematographer

| former name =
| holder_label = Most recent winner
| holder =  Bhuvanesh Prabhu
| award1_type = Total awarded
| award1_winner = 53
| award2_type = First winner
| award2_winner = R. N. K. Prasad
| award3_type = Last winner
| award3_winner =
| website =
| previous =
| next =
}}
Karnataka State Film Award for Best Cinematographer is a state film award of the Indian state of Karnataka  given during the annual Karnataka State Film Awards. The award honors Kannada language films.
Superlative winners
{| class="wikitable sortable"
||R. N. K. PrasadS. V. SrikanthD. V. RajaramH. M. RamachandraG. S. Bhaskar|| 3 Awards
|-
|S. RamachandraB. C. Gowrishankar|| 4 Awards
|}
indicates one Awardee for different films.
